name: wooden-channapatna-toy
description: Channapatna is famous for its wooden toys and Lacquerware. The city, situated between Bengaluru and Mysuru, is world famous as the “TOYS CITY. In Kannada, Channapatna is also called as Goombegala Ooru, meaning toys town in English. These toys are made of a specific wood, called as Aale Mara or the ivory wood.

name: wooden lights
description: Wood and light in their most elemental combination is fire. Certainly, torches and camp fires are the base origins of light fixtures as we know them today. Wood however has seldom been the key material of choice for the design and manufacture of decorative lighting, historically being overshadowed by brass, steel, glass and even paper.
